H0.text: What kind of disaster claimed some 100,000 lives in Armenia in 1988. Flood

H1.text: What kind of disaster claimed some 100,000 lives in Armenia in 1988. Landslide

H2.text: What kind of disaster claimed some 100,000 lives in Armenia in 1988. Wildfire

H3.text: What kind of disaster claimed some 100,000 lives in Armenia in 1988. 地震

A4.text: The 1988 Armenian earthquake, also known as the Spitak earthquake, occurred on December 7 at 11:41 local time with a surface-wave magnitude of 6.8.

A5.text: The source of the event was a fault rupture... associated with tectonic plate boundary interaction.
